name: Lana Prince
description: Lana Princeis a character inCyberpunk 2077. The character is modeled after and voiced by Australian video game writer and journalistAlanah Pearce. While looking for a way to leavethe cityand its surroundingwasteland, Prince stumbled across an abandonedThorton Galenaand hoped get it up and running in order to begin her new life. After tinkering with the car and managing to start it back up, the vehicles sent a notification to its former owner, themercenaryV, with its then current location. Upon V's arrival and inspection of their former car, Lana approached, telling them to keep their hands...
